attributes.action: To put a stop to online sites selling live animals
attributes.additional_details:
The sale of dogs, cats, other pets and live animals needs to be stopped.

The trafficking of these animals is cruel and fueling theft and profiteering from animals

Online sites are often used to sell stolen pets and by puppy farmers who are not interested in animal welfare.

They exist as a means to a sale with no questions asked, the public are being conned in a lot of cases
attributes.background: To stop online sites selling live animals and pets
